about_the_game:
Welcome to the Pizza Pups Multidimensional Pizzeria Driving Evaluation Simulation or P.P.M.P.D.E.S.

Are you ready to become a delivery driver in the multiverse? In P.P.M.P.D.E.S. you'll need to Master insane obstacle courses, avoid bizarre hazards, and prove you have what it takes to deliver pizzas to the multiverse!

How It Works:

Complete the Driving Course: All new employees must pass our challenging delivery test to earn their official Pizza Pups Multidimensional Pizzeria Drivers License. License Required: Be sure to present a valid multiversal driver's license at the start. Don't have one? That's fine The MDSC can cover you. 

Gameplay Features:

  • An obstacle course like no other: Navigate through a multiverse of driving challenges as you use all tools at your disposal to reach the top and prove you have what it takes.

  • Co-op: Don't want to pass the test alone? then invite a friend to join you in getting to the top using more than one car to break the laws of physics in all new ways.

  • Single Player: Don't have friends? Don't worry the course is fully completable alone. You won't even notice how lonely you are when you take our test.

  • Perform Epic Stunts: Use our (Patent Not Pending) Jump and Flip vehicle tech to perform incredible stunts, dodge traps, and clear seemingly impossible obstacles.

  • A thrilling story with a unsatisfying conclusion: Experience a story that you've possibly been through before as you follow new hire Hajime trying his best to make it past the training course laid out before him. All so you can look forward to hearing what happens to him in the upcoming Pizza Rogue!

  • Skill-Based Progression: Improve your driving skills as you go and clear more and more floors as you make your way to the top using all the tools available to you

  • A Multiverse of Challenges: Every level takes on the appearances and challenges of a new multiverse in a challenge that will keep you on your toes at every turn of the wheel.

Do you have what it takes to drive through the multiverse?

Jump.

Flip.

Speed your way to the top-alone or with friends to find out if you have what it takes!

content_descriptors.notes: Dialogue has a chance to contain profanity and cars can be cartoonishly blown up
